definition: to depict/to trace (a drawing)/to copy/to touch up
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Each embroidery is designed step by step.
sentences.chinese: 將描圖紙打洞是刺繡設計的前置步驟。

sentences.english: Low power scanning electron microscope image of tooth surface, computer-coloured yellow on blue background.
sentences.chinese: 牙齒表面的電子顯微鏡掃描圖。

sentences.english: Vellum paper with a glazed surface is used for decorative documents.
sentences.chinese: 是厚的描圖紙，尤其方便用在針筆線圖上。
這個繪圖員描圖的技術好。

sentences.english: To illustrate the result of identification.
Objective To introduce the diagnostic value of infrared rays image for chronic pelvic inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析紅外熱像掃描圖對慢性盆腔炎的診斷價值。

sentences.english: White tracing paper should be used on fabric.
sentences.chinese: 把白色的描圖紙放在面料上。

sentences.english: Vellum is a thick tracing paper stock, good for line drawing.
sentences.chinese: 是厚的描圖紙，尤其方便用在針筆線圖上。

sentences.english: The illustrations look as though a teenager copied an image using tracing paper.
sentences.chinese: 看起來就像一個十幾歲複製圖像使用描圖紙的插圖。

sentences.english: Mastering tools, marking tools and miscellaneous tools are newest products too.
sentences.chinese: 品，還有測量工具描圖工作和其它工作都是最新產品。
這個繪圖員描圖的技術好。
